code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";/* REACT BOOTSTRAP */import{Carousel,Image}from"react-bootstrap";/* REACT - REDUX */import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";/* REACT ROUTER */import{Link}from"react-router-dom";/* COMPONENTS */import Loader from"./Loader";import Message from"./Message";/* ACTION TYPES */import{listTopProducts}from"../actions/productActions";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductCarousel(){var dispatch=useDispatch();/* PULLING A PART OF STATE FROM THE ACTUAL STATE IN THE REDUX STORE */var productTopRated=useSelector(function(state){return state.productTopRated;});var error=productTopRated.error,loading=productTopRated.loading,products=productTopRated.products;useEffect(function(){dispatch(listTopProducts());},[dispatch]);return loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{}):error?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Message,{variant:"danger",children:error}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel,{pause:"hover",className:"bg-dark",children:products.map(function(product){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Item,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{src:product.image,alt:product.name,fluid:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Caption,{className:"carousel.caption",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:[product.name," (EGP",product.price,")"]})})]})},product._id);})});}export default ProductCarousel;
